title: Wait, if we miss one day of the 10th anniversary rewards, we miss out fully?
body: So, me having a life means my main misses out on the Annie skin? Wild.

replies.body: You shouldn't miss out on any of the missions/rewards just for missing one day while they're being unlocked. As per the [Support Article for the 10th Anniversary Missions/Rewards](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/360036377774-Let-s-Celebrate-10-Years-of-League-), all missions (including the bonus mission for the Annie-versary skin) will be available until the 19th of November. If you're having any issues with the anniversary missions, you should submit a ticket to [Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) (use the "I have an Event question or issue" option).

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=PJBMekya,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-10-23T01:47:14.297+0000)
>
> You shouldn't miss out on any of the missions/rewards just for missing one day while they're being unlocked. As per the [Support Article for the 10th Anniversary Missions/Rewards](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/360036377774-Let-s-Celebrate-10-Years-of-League-), all missions (including the bonus mission for the Annie-versary skin) will be available until the 19th of November. If you're having any issues with the anniversary missions, you should submit a ticket to [Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) (use the "I have an Event question or issue" option).

Why is the anniversary page so poorly worded? It says from the 17th of October to the 27th. Sigh. Lmao. I didn't have to rush home, then. Thank the lord.
Because those are the days that the missions become available. I agree it's a bit confusing if you haven't found the support article, which wasn't really advertised anywhere.
